title: Handle In-Game Weather Delay
description: A lightning storm forces a temporary suspension of a game. The league official on site must manage the delay.

tasks.description: Receive a lightning proximity alert from the weather service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets an alert that lightning is within a dangerous radius of the stadium.

tasks.description: Instruct the on-field officials to suspend the game and move players and staff to safety.
Monitor the weather service for an 'all-clear' notification.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent waits for the storm to pass.

tasks.description: Once it is safe, consult with both teams and the officials to resume the game.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent coordinates the resumption of the game.
